org.nzdis.micro

Class PlatformController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nzdis.micro.PlatformController

  • public class PlatformController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlatformController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean platformRunning()
      Indicates if the platform is running.
      static void shutdownPlatform()
      Shuts down platform.
      static void shutdownPlatformAndJvm()
      This method shuts down the platform as well as the JVM instance.
      static void shutdownPlatformInBackground(PlatformActionListener listener)
      Shuts the platform down asynchronously and notifies the listener (if not null) once completed.
      static void startPlatform()
      Starts platform and all related services as configured with MicroBootProperties or configuration file (platform.xml).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlatformController

        public PlatformController()

    • Method Detail

      • startPlatform

        public static void startPlatform()
        Starts platform and all related services as configured with MicroBootProperties or configuration file (platform.xml).

      • shutdownPlatformInBackground

        public static void shutdownPlatformInBackground(PlatformActionListener listener)
        Shuts the platform down asynchronously and notifies the listener (if not null) once completed.
        Parameters:
        listener - PlatformActionListener implementing necessary caller action. If null, it just shuts down the platform (in the background) without notification.

      • shutdownPlatform

        public static void shutdownPlatform()
        Shuts down platform.

      • platformRunning

        public static boolean platformRunning()
        Indicates if the platform is running.
        Returns:
        true indicates running platform, false indicates non-running

      • shutdownPlatformAndJvm

        public static void shutdownPlatformAndJvm()
        This method shuts down the platform as well as the JVM instance. Use this with care as it will harden debugging. Alternative: shutdownPlatform()
